message.content:
Tyler and Kyle share Ethan as a common ancestor, as deduced from the given lineage relationships.

<ANSWER>4</ANSWER>

We have from Tyler: Ethan -> Dylan -> Theresa -> Terry -> Cynthia -> Karen -> Juan -> Gloria -> Christina -> Jose -> Pamela -> Russell -> Paul -> Benjamin -> Steven -> Donald -> Peter -> Arthur -> Jacqueline -> Kevin -> Wayne -> Jonathan -> Shirley -> Janice -> Patricia -> Bryan -> Kelly -> Gregory -> Ann -> Sara -> Scott -> Amanda -> Richard -> Jeffrey -> Doris -> Roger -> Anthony -> Sophia -> Ralph -> Dennis -> Brian -> Beverly -> Debra -> Nancy -> Joe -> Carolyn -> Stephen -> John -> Julie -> Douglas -> Joseph -> Jason -> Bobby -> Natalie -> Marilyn -> Kimberly -> Jordan -> Mary -> Lori -> Alexis -> Bruce -> Helen -> Kenneth -> Jennifer -> Elijah -> Gabriel -> Brittany -> Jesse -> Susan -> Timothy -> Carol -> Andrew -> Alice -> Megan -> Albert -> Charles -> Emma -> Anna -> Christopher -> Linda -> Eric -> Judy -> Donna -> Robert -> Julia -> Hannah -> David -> Harold -> William -> Maria -> Noah -> Philip -> Olivia -> Logan -> Joyce -> Alexander -> Ashley -> Gary -> Jacob -> Jessica -> Gerald -> Daniel -> Sharon -> Rebecca -> Matthew -> Tyler. That's a very long chain, but it includes Ethan as an ancestor of Tyler via Dylan. And from Kyle: Ethan -> Alan -> Jeremy -> Katherine -> Samuel -> Angela -> Kayla -> Laura -> Melissa -> Justin -> Madison -> Frank -> Carl -> Frances -> Samantha -> Deborah -> Billy -> Walter -> Rachel -> Edward -> Kathleen -> Lawrence -> Kyle. So indeed Ethan is common.

We should also check if there is any other common ancestor, but one is enough.

Thus answer is 4.
